title: President Donald J. Trump Announces Intent to Appoint Individuals to Key Administration Posts – The White House
content:
Nominations & Appointments			
Issued on:
October 7, 2020
Today, President Donald J. Trump announced his intent to appoint the following individuals to key positions in his Administration:Sean Plankey, of Connecticut, to be Assistant Director for Infrastructure Security, Department of Homeland Security. Major General Randy “Church” Kee, USAF (Ret.), of Alaska, to be a Member of the Arctic Research Commission.Justin M. Peterson, of the District of Columbia, to be a Member of the Financial Oversight and Management Board for Puerto Rico.
